attributes.action: Either get a grip on the erosion of our society or get out and let someone else have a go
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our society is eroding before us, the treatment of Gary Newlove is an example of the manifestation of what is happening to us. His murderers first reaction, we are led to believe, is to appeal their convictions. Your Govt is wholly culpable and responsible for this. What life is there for my children if they are to be brought up in a society where responsiblity is alien and indeed people have no compunction in killng people defending themselves or their property.Sort this out or get out please.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
